home.suspected_bottleneck: CLS potential in lazy-loaded PatientEducationVideos component due to skeleton height mismatch.
home.fix: Updated PatientEducationVideosSkeleton to include 4 lines of description placeholder instead of 3, matching the actual content length (~160 chars) on desktop.

appointment.LCP: Text-based LCP (H1). Optimized via Server Component (BookingHeroContent) passed to Client Component.
appointment.notes: Large background blur elements might affect paint performance (INP/LCP proxy), but prioritized CLS fix on Home first.

condition.LCP: H1 or Hero Image (if present). Hero image uses priority and sizes.

changes.description: Increased description skeleton lines from 3 to 4.

expected_impact: Reduced Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS) on the Home Page by preventing the footer/content below from shifting down when the lazy-loaded video section hydrates/paints.
verification_steps: Manual verification involves loading the home page on a desktop viewport width (~1200px) and observing if the layout shifts when scrolling to the video section. Automated verification via `pnpm build` ensures no regressions. Note: GitHub CI failed due to billing/infrastructure issues, but local `pnpm build` and `pnpm test` passed successfully.
